description.p: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

sheet.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as bright light, and darkness as dim light.

description.p: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

sheet.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as bright light, and darkness as dim light.

description.p: The Bith are a peaceful, highly intelligent species known for their exceptional sensory perception and musical talent. Their large craniums house advanced brains that process auditory and olfactory information with remarkable precision.
Your Bith character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Dexterity score increases by 1.
Age. Bith have a normal lifespan comparable to humans.
Size. Bith stand around 5 to 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Keen Investigation. You have advantage on Investigation checks.
Keen Perception. You have advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing or smell.
Musician. You are proficient with one musical instrument of your choice.
Slicer Training. You are proficient with slicing kits.
Sonic Vulnerability. You are vulnerable to sonic damage.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic, Bith, and one additional language of your choice.
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.

Bothans are a species of short, furry humanoids known for their skills in espionage, intelligence gathering, and political maneuvering. Their culture revolves around information trading and they are often found working as spies, diplomats, or politicians.
Your Bothan character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Dexterity score increases by 1.
Age. Bothans have a normal lifespan comparable to humans.
Size. Bothans are slightly smaller than humans, standing 4 to 5 feet tall. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Cunning Action. You can take the Hide or Disengage action as a bonus action on each of your turns.
Deception Training. You are proficient in the Deception skill.
Insight Training. You are proficient in the Insight skill.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Bothese.
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.

The Cathar are a species of feline humanoids known for their fierce loyalty and honor. They have a strong warrior culture but are also deeply emotional and passionate beings with a strong sense of justice.
Your Cathar character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Charisma score increases by 1.
Age. Cathar have a normal lifespan comparable to humans.
Size. Cathar are similar in size to humans, though slightly more muscular. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
Natural Weapons. Your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 kinetic damage instead of the normal bludgeoning damage and have the finesse property.
Stealth Training. You are proficient in the Stealth skill.
Expert Climber. You have a climbing speed of 30 feet. You have advantage on Strength saving throws and Athletics checks when climbing.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Catharese.
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.
Chagrians are amphibious humanoids distinguished by their horned heads and blue skin. They are native to the oceanic planet Champala and are known for their diplomatic skills and calm demeanor.
Your Chagrian character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.
Age. Chagrians have a normal lifespan comparable to humans.
Size. Chagrians stand between 5 and 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
Amphibious. You can breathe air and water.
Swimmer. You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.
Poison Resilience. You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Chagri.
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.

The Chiss are a near-human species with blue skin and dark hair, known for their tactical brilliance and disciplined military structure. They come from the Unknown Regions and value precision, discipline, and tactical superiority.
Your Chiss character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Charisma score increases by 1.
Age. Chiss have a normal lifespan comparable to humans.
Size. Chiss stand between 5 and 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
Armor Training. You are proficient with light armor and medium armor.
Weapon Training. You are proficient with sniper rifles.
Insight Training. You are proficient in the Insight skill.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Cheunh.
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.

Devaronians are humanoids with distinctive horns and red or brown skin. They are known for their natural curiosity and wanderlust, with males often traveling the galaxy while females tend to stay on their homeworld managing political affairs.
Your Devaronian character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Constitution score increases by 2, and your Charisma score increases by 1.
Age. Devaronians have a normal lifespan comparable to humans.
Size. Devaronians stand between 5 and 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Heat Adapted. You have advantage on Constitution saving throws to avoid heat exhaustion.
Jungle Dweller. Jungle terrain is not difficult terrain for you (though spells like entangle can still affect you).
Poison Resilience. You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage.
Skill Versatility. You are proficient in one skill of your choice from Survival or Investigation, and one skill of your choice from Deception or Persuasion.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Devaronese.
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.

Protocol droids are designed for etiquette, translation, and diplomatic functions. They are fluent in millions of forms of communication and are programmed to understand the customs and protocols of countless cultures.
Your protocol droid character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Charisma score increases by 2, and either your Intelligence or Wisdom score increases by 1.
Age. Droids do not age but require regular maintenance.
Size. Protocol droids stand around 5 to 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 25 feet.
Constructed Resilience. You are resistant to necrotic and psychic damage, and you are immune to poison damage.
Ion Vulnerability. You are vulnerable to ion damage and have disadvantage on saving throws against effects that deal ion or lightning damage.
Force Insensitive. You cannot use Force powers.
Integrated Armor. You cannot wear armor, but you can have armor plating attached.
Machine. You cannot be healed by kolto, bacta, or Force powers.
Tune-Up. As a bonus action, you can regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your level. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.
History Training. You are proficient in the History skill.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write all languages.
Combat droids are designed for warfare and security operations. They are built to withstand damage and are programmed with combat protocols to engage enemy forces effectively.
Your combat droid character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Constitution score increases by 2, and either your Strength or Dexterity score increases by 1.
Age. Droids do not age but require regular maintenance.
Size. Combat droids are slightly larger than humans, standing 5.5 to 6.5 feet tall. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Constructed Resilience. You are resistant to necrotic and psychic damage, and you are immune to poison damage.
Ion Vulnerability. You are vulnerable to ion damage and have disadvantage on saving throws against effects that deal ion or lightning damage.
Force Insensitive. You cannot use Force powers.
Integrated Armor. You cannot wear armor, but you can have armor plating attached.
Machine. You cannot be healed by kolto, bacta, or Force powers.
Tune-Up. As a bonus action, you can regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your level. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.
Armor Training. You are proficient with light armor and medium armor.
Weapon Training. You are proficient with two simple or martial vibroweapons of your choice.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Binary. You can understand Binary.
The Duros are a humanoid species with smooth blue-green skin, red eyes, and no nose. They are natural spacers and pilots, with a culture deeply tied to starship travel and exploration.
Your Duros character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.
Age. Duros live approximately 150 years.
Size. Duros stand between 5 and 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
History Training. You are proficient in the History skill.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Durese.
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.
Ewoks are small, furry bipeds native to the forest moon of Endor. Despite their cute appearance, they are skilled hunters and warriors with a deep connection to nature and primitive technology.
Your Ewok character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.
Age. Ewoks live approximately 50 years.
Size. Ewoks stand about 3 feet tall. Your size is Small.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 25 feet.
Keen Smell. You have advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell.
Nimble. You can hide behind creatures that are larger than you.
Expert Climber. You have a climbing speed of 25 feet. You have advantage on Strength saving throws and Athletics checks when climbing.
Small Build. You can only wield two-handed weapons if they have the versatile property. You cannot use physical or energy shields.
Nature Training. You are proficient in the Nature skill.
Survival Training. You are proficient in the Survival skill.
Musician. You are proficient with one musical instrument of your choice.
Languages. You can speak Ewokese and understand Galactic Basic (though you cannot speak it).
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.
Gamorreans are porcine humanoids known for their strength and brutality. They are often employed as mercenaries, guards, or enforcers due to their intimidating presence and combat prowess.
Your Gamorrean character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.
Age. Gamorreans live approximately 70 years.
Size. Gamorreans stand between 5.5 and 6.5 feet tall. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Durable. Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.
Constitution Resilience. You have advantage on Constitution saving throws.
Weapon Training. You are proficient with vibro-axes and vibroswords.
Brutal Critical. When you score a critical hit with a weapon attack, you add one additional weapon damage die to the damage.
Languages. You can speak Gamorrese and understand Galactic Basic (though you cannot speak it).
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.
Geonosians are insectoid humanoids from the planet Geonosis. They have a hive-based society and are known for their technological expertise, particularly in droid manufacturing.
Your Geonosian character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.
Age. Geonosians have a normal lifespan comparable to humans.
Size. Geonosians stand between 5 and 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Natural Armor. When unarmored or wearing light armor, your AC equals 12 + your Dexterity modifier.
Flight. You have a flying speed equal to your walking speed. Your flying speed is halved when wearing medium or heavy armor.
Sonic Weapon Training. You are proficient with sonic pistols and sonic rifles.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Geonosian.
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.

Gran are three-eyed humanoids known for their warm, friendly demeanor and their ability to read emotions. Their three eyes give them excellent vision, and they are known for being peaceful and community-oriented.
Your Gran character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Constitution score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.
Age. Gran have a normal lifespan comparable to humans.
Size. Gran stand between 5 and 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Durable. Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.
Slow Metabolism. Your metabolism is slower than most species, requiring less sustenance.
Keen Sight. You have advantage on Perception checks that rely on sight.
Insight Training. You are proficient in the Insight skill.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Gran.
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.
Humans are the most adaptable and ambitious people among the common species in the galaxy. They have widely varying tastes, morals, and customs in the many different systems where they have settled.
Your Human character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Four different ability scores of your choice each increase by 1.
Age. Humans have a normal lifespan comparable to most species, reaching adulthood in their late teens and living less than a century.
Size. Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Determination. You can add 1d4 to one ability check, saving throw, or attack roll. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.
Skill Versatility. You gain proficiency in one skill and one weapon of your choice.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and one additional language of your choice.
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.
Humans are the most adaptable and ambitious people among the common species in the galaxy. They have widely varying tastes, morals, and customs in the many different systems where they have settled.
Your Human character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. One ability score of your choice increases by 2, and two different ability scores of your choice each increase by 1.
Age. Humans have a normal lifespan comparable to most species, reaching adulthood in their late teens and living less than a century.
Size. Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Determination. You can add 1d4 to one ability check, saving throw, or attack roll. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.
Skill Versatility. You gain proficiency in one skill and one weapon of your choice.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and one additional language of your choice.
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.
Ithorians are tall, thin humanoids with long necks and distinctive hammer-shaped heads. They are known as "Hammerheads" and are famous for their botanical expertise and pacifist nature.
Your Ithorian character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Charisma score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.
Age. Ithorians have a normal lifespan comparable to humans.
Size. Ithorians are tall, standing between 6 and 7 feet. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Nature Training. You are proficient in the Nature skill.

Sonic Scream. As an action, you can violently expel air in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a Wisdom saving throw (DC = 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Constitution modifier). A creature takes 2d6 sonic damage on a failed save, and half as much damage on a successful one. The damage increases to 4d6 at 5th level, 6d6 at 11th level, and 8d6 at 17th level. This ability has no effect on constructs. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you complete a long rest.
Languages. You can speak Ithorese and understand Galactic Basic (though you cannot speak it).
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.
Jawas are small, rodent-like humanoids native to Tatooine. They are known for their scavenging abilities, technical aptitude, and distinctive language.
Your Jawa character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.
Age. Jawas have a normal lifespan comparable to humans.
Size. Jawas stand about 3 feet tall. Your size is Small.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 25 feet.
Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
Nimble. You can hide behind creatures that are larger than you.
Heat Adapted. You have advantage on Constitution saving throws to avoid heat exhaustion.
Sleight of Hand Training. You are proficient in the Sleight of Hand skill.
Small Build. You can only wield two-handed weapons if they have the versatile property. You cannot use physical or energy shields.
Ion Weapon Training. You are proficient with ion pistols and ion rifles.
Languages. You can speak Jawaese and understand Galactic Basic (though you cannot speak it).
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.
The Kaleesh are a reptilian humanoid species known for their warrior culture and distinctive bone masks. They are feared throughout the galaxy for their combat prowess and hunting skills.
Your Kaleesh character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Dexterity score increases by 1.
Age. Kaleesh have a normal lifespan comparable to humans.
Size. Kaleesh stand between 5.5 and 6.5 feet tall. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
Keen Smell. You have advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell.
Weapon Training. You are proficient with vibropikes and vibrospears.
Survival Training. You are proficient in the Survival skill.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Kaleesh.
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.
Kel Dors are an alien species with orange skin and sophisticated breathing apparatus. They are known for their strong sense of justice and many become Jedi or law enforcement officers.
Your Kel Dor character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Wisdom score increases by 2, and your Dexterity score increases by 1.
Age. Kel Dors have a normal lifespan comparable to humans.
Size. Kel Dors stand between 5 and 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
Necrotic Resistance. You have resistance to necrotic damage.
Breathless. You cannot breathe oxygen and require a breathing apparatus in oxygen-rich atmospheres.
Telepathy. You can communicate telepathically with creatures within 30 feet of you.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Kel Dor.
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.
Mirialans are a near-human species with yellowish-green skin and geometric facial tattoos that signify their achievements. They are deeply spiritual and many are drawn to the Force.
Your Mirialan character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.
Age. Mirialans have a normal lifespan comparable to humans.
Size. Mirialans stand between 5 and 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 35 feet.
History Expertise. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for History checks.
Surprise Attack. If an enemy is surprised, your first attack against it deals an extra 2d6 damage.
Natural Weapons. Your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 kinetic damage and have the finesse property.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Mirialan.
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.
Mon Calamari are amphibious humanoids known for their artistic sensibilities and exceptional ship design skills. Their iconic cruisers played a crucial role in the Rebel Alliance.
Your Mon Calamari character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Charisma score increases by 2, and either your Intelligence or Wisdom score increases by 1.
Age. Mon Calamari have a normal lifespan comparable to humans.
Size. Mon Calamari stand between 5 and 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
Cold Resistance. You have resistance to cold damage.
Amphibious. You can breathe air and water.
Slow Resistance. You have advantage on saving throws against being slowed.
Musician. You are proficient with one musical instrument of your choice.
Swimmer. You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic, Mon Cal, and one additional language of your choice.
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.
Nautolans are amphibious humanoids with distinctive tentacles extending from their heads. They are known for their ability to sense pheromones and their affinity for water environments.
Your Nautolan character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.
Age. Nautolans have a normal lifespan comparable to humans.
Size. Nautolans stand between 5 and 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
Amphibious. You can breathe air and water.
Perception Expertise. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for Perception checks.
Natural Armor. When unarmored or wearing light armor, your AC equals 12 + your Dexterity modifier.
Swimmer. You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Nautila.
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.
Neimoidians are green-skinned humanoids known for their business acumen and trade federation. They are often seen as greedy and cowardly but are skilled negotiators and merchants.
Your Neimoidian character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Charisma score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.
Age. Neimoidians live approximately 150 years.
Size. Neimoidians stand between 5 and 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
Deception Training. You are proficient in the Deception skill.
Persuasion Training. You are proficient in the Persuasion skill.
Wealthy. You start with an additional 1000 credits.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Pak Pak.
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.
Ortolans are small, blue-furred humanoids with long snouts and large ears. They are known for their musical talent and their love of food, often becoming famous musicians.
Your Ortolan character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Charisma score increases by 1.
Age. Ortolans have a normal lifespan comparable to humans.
Size. Ortolans stand about 3 to 4 feet tall. Your size is Small.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 25 feet.
Cold Resistance. You have resistance to cold damage.
Survival Expertise. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for Survival checks.
Keen Senses. You have advantage on Perception checks that involve hearing or smell.
Musician. You are proficient with one musical instrument of your choice.
Nimble. You can hide behind creatures that are larger than you.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Ortolan.
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.
The Rakata are an ancient species that once ruled the galaxy through their Infinite Empire. They have a strong connection to technology but have lost their sensitivity to the Force over millennia.
Your Rakata character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.
Age. Rakata have a normal lifespan comparable to humans.
Size. Rakata are tall, standing between 6 and 7 feet. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
Amphibious. You can breathe air and water.
Force Insensitive. You cannot use Force powers.
Natural Weapons. Your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 kinetic damage.
Slicer Training. You are proficient with slicing kits.
Consume Corpse. As an action, you can eat a corpse to gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier + your hit die.
Swimmer. You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Rakata.
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.
Rattataki are pale-skinned humanoids known for their warrior culture and combat arenas. They hail from Rattatak and value strength and martial prowess above all else.
Your Rattataki character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Wisdom score increases by 2, and either your Dexterity or Intelligence score increases by 1.
Age. Rattataki have a normal lifespan comparable to humans.
Size. Rattataki are slightly smaller than humans, standing 4.5 to 5.5 feet tall. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 35 feet.
Acrobatics Training. You are proficient in the Acrobatics skill.
Intimidation Training. You are proficient in the Intimidation skill.
Surprise Attack. If an enemy is surprised, your first attack against it deals an extra 2d6 damage.
Natural Weapons. Your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 kinetic damage and have the finesse property.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Rattataki.
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.
Rodians are green-skinned humanoids with large eyes and flexible snouts. They are known for their hunting culture and are often found working as bounty hunters or mercenaries.
Your Rodian character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.
Age. Rodians have a normal lifespan comparable to humans.
Size. Rodians stand between 5 and 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
Keen Senses. You have advantage on Perception checks that involve hearing or smell.
Expert Climber. You have a climbing speed of 30 feet.
Survival Training. You are proficient in the Survival skill.
Stealth Training. You are proficient in the Stealth skill.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Rodese.
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.
Sith Purebloods are the original species from which the Sith Order takes its name. They are known for their red skin, facial tendrils, and natural affinity for the dark side of the Force.
Your Sith Pureblood character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Charisma score increases by 2, and either your Strength or Dexterity score increases by 1.
Age. Sith Purebloods have a normal lifespan comparable to humans.
Size. Sith Purebloods stand between 5 and 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
Perception Training. You are proficient in the Perception skill.
Intimidation Training. You are proficient in the Intimidation skill.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Sith.
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.
Sullustans are small, jowled humanoids with large ears and dark eyes. They are native to the volcanic planet Sullust and are known for their piloting skills and friendly demeanor.
Your Sullustan character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Dexterity score increases by 1.
Age. Sullustans have a normal lifespan comparable to humans.
Size. Sullustans are relatively small, standing 4 to 5 feet tall. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
Keen Hearing. You have advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing.
Persuasion Expertise. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for Persuasion checks.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Sullustese.
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.

Talz are large, furry humanoids with four eyes and sharp talons. They are native to the frozen planet Alzoc III and are known for their strength and gentle nature despite their intimidating appearance.
Your Talz character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.
Age. Talz live approximately 50 years.
Size. Talz are relatively tall, standing between 6 and 7 feet. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
Natural Armor. When unarmored or wearing light armor, your AC equals 12 + your Dexterity modifier.
Long Reach. Your melee reach is 5 feet greater than normal.
Languages. You can speak Talzzi and understand Galactic Basic (though you cannot speak it).
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.
Togruta are humanoids with distinctive montrals (head-tails) and striped patterns on their skin. They are native to the planet Shili and are known for their communal nature and hunting skills.
Your Togruta character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Wisdom score increases by 2, and either your Strength or Dexterity score increases by 1.
Age. Togruta have a normal lifespan comparable to humans.
Size. Togruta stand between 5 and 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Stealth Advantage. You have advantage on Stealth checks.
Survival Training. You are proficient in the Survival skill.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Togruti.
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.
Trandoshans are reptilian humanoids known for their hunting culture and worship of a deity called the Scorekeeper. They have a natural rivalry with Wookiees and are skilled trackers and hunters.
Your Trandoshan character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.
Age. Trandoshans have a normal lifespan comparable to humans.
Size. Trandoshans are relatively tall, standing between 6 and 7 feet. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Natural Weapons. Your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 kinetic damage.
Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
Natural Armor. When unarmored or wearing light armor, your AC equals 12 + your Dexterity modifier.
Regeneration. When you take damage, you can use your reaction and expend a Hit Die to regain hit points as long as the damage would not reduce your hit points to 0.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Dosh.
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.
Tusken Raiders, also known as Sand People, are fierce nomadic warriors native to Tatooine. They are extremely territorial and have a deep connection to their harsh desert environment.
Your Tusken character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Constitution score increases by 2, and either your Strength or Charisma score increases by 1.
Age. Tuskens live approximately 50 years.
Size. Tuskens stand between 5 and 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Animal Handling Training. You are proficient in the Animal Handling skill.
Blind Resilience. You have advantage on saving throws against being blinded.
Survival Training. You are proficient in the Survival skill.
Desert Dweller. Desert terrain is not difficult terrain for you.
Heat Adapted. You have advantage on Constitution saving throws to avoid heat exhaustion.
Primitive. You cannot operate wrist blasters, launchers, slicing kits, or other high-tech devices.
Weapon Training. You are proficient with cycler rifles and vibro-axes.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Tusken.
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.

Twi'leks are humanoids with distinctive head-tails called lekku. They come in various skin colors and are known for their adaptability, often serving as entertainers, merchants, or slaves across the galaxy.
Your Twi'Lek character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Charisma score increases by 2, and your Dexterity score increases by 1.
Age. Twi'leks have a normal lifespan comparable to humans.
Size. Twi'leks stand between 5 and 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
Skill Versatility. You are proficient in one skill of your choice from Deception or Persuasion.
Performance Training. You are proficient in the Performance skill.
Poison Resilience. You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage.
Natural Weapons. Your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 kinetic damage and have the finesse property.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Twi'leki.
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.

Ugnaughts are small, porcine humanoids known for their mechanical aptitude and work in industrial settings. They are skilled laborers and often work on starships, refineries, and construction projects.
Your Ugnaught character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Strength score increases by 1.
Age. Ugnaughts live approximately 200 years.
Size. Ugnaughts stand about 3 to 4 feet tall. Your size is Small.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 25 feet.
Natural Weapons (Tusk). Your unarmed strike (tusk) deals 1d6 kinetic damage.
Slicer Training. You are proficient with slicing kits.
Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
Acid Resistance. You have resistance to acid damage.
Nimble. You can hide behind creatures that are larger than you.
Small Build. You can only wield two-handed weapons if they have the versatile property. You cannot use physical or energy shields.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Ugnaught.
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.

Weequays are rough, leathery-skinned humanoids known for their toughness and brutality. They are often employed as mercenaries, pirates, or guards due to their intimidating presence and combat skills.
Your Weequay character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Constitution score increases by 2, and either your Wisdom or Charisma score increases by 1.
Age. Weequays have a normal lifespan comparable to humans.
Size. Weequays stand between 5 and 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Keen Smell. You have advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell.
Brutal Critical. When you score a critical hit with a weapon attack, you add one additional weapon damage die to the damage.
Natural Armor. When unarmored or wearing light armor, your AC equals 13 + your Dexterity modifier.
Weapon Training. You are proficient with two vibroweapons or blasters of your choice.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Sriluurian.
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.
Wookiees are tall, furry humanoids known for their great strength and loyalty. They are fierce warriors with a strong sense of honor and are renowned for their skill in starship repair and piloting.
Your Wookiee character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.
Age. Wookiees live approximately 400 years.
Size. Wookiees are tall, standing between 7 and 8 feet. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Natural Weapons. Your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 kinetic damage.
Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
Natural Armor. When unarmored or wearing light armor, your AC equals 13 + your Dexterity modifier.
Intimidation Training. You are proficient in the Intimidation skill.
Expert Climber. You have a climbing speed of 30 feet.
Languages. You can speak Shyriiwook and understand Galactic Basic (though you cannot speak it).
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.
Zabraks are near-human species with distinctive horns and facial tattoos. They are known for their determination and strong will, making them formidable warriors and Force users.
Your Zabrak character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Constitution score increases by 2, and either your Strength or Dexterity score increases by 1.
Age. Zabraks have a normal lifespan comparable to humans.
Size. Zabraks stand between 5 and 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Skill Versatility. You are proficient in one skill of your choice from Persuasion or Intimidation.
Defiant. When you are reduced to 0 hit points, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.
Durable. Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.
Natural Weapons. Your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 kinetic damage and have the finesse property.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Zabraki.
Cyborg Option. You may choose to become a Cyborg, gaining cybernetic enhancements.

Your metabolism is slower than most species, requiring less sustenance.

description.p: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.
When you are reduced to 0 hit points, you can drop to 1 hit point instead once per long rest.

sheet.description: +1 HP per level. Once per long rest, when reduced to 0 HP, drop to 1 HP instead.

description.p: You can understand Galactic Basic but cannot speak it.

sheet.description: Understands Galactic Basic but cannot speak it.

description.p: As an action, you can violently expel air in a 15-foot cone. When you do so, each creature in the area of the exhalation must make a Wisdom saving throw (DC = 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Constitution modifier). A creature takes 2d6 sonic damage on a failed save, and half as much damage on a successful one. The damage increases to 4d6 at 5th level, 6d6 at 11th level, and 8d6 at 17th level. This ability has no effect on constructs. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you complete a long rest.

sheet.description: Expel air in a 15-ft cone. Wisdom save (DC {{ithorian-scream:dc}}) for {{ithorian-scream:damage}} sonic damage (half on success). No effect on constructs.

description.p: Quickly repair some damage on your body. On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your level. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.
You are vulnerable to ion damage.
You are vulnerable to sonic damage.

You are vulnerable to energy damage.
